tool.name: JBrowse - Data Directory to Standalone
tool.description: upgrades the bare data directory to a full JBrowse instance
tool.command:
## Create output directory mkdir -p $output.files_path && ## Copy in jbrowse cp -R \${JBROWSE_SOURCE_DIR}/* $output.files_path/ &&
## Copy in data directory cp -R $input.dataset.extra_files_path/data/ $output.files_path/ && mv $output.files_path/index.html $output

param.label: JBrowse Data Directory
param.name: input
param.help: Look for datasets with 'JBrowse ... Data Directory' in the name

tool.help:
Upgrades an existing bare JBrowse "data" directory into a full-fledged JBrowse instance.
@ATTRIBUTION@
